message:
Click anywhere on the canvas to 
- Open a new window
- ⁠Write a note
- ⁠Paste from clipboard

— Windows —
Create a new window:                            ⌘ N
Minimize window:                                    ⌘ M
Switch to previous / next window:    ⌘ ← / ⌘ →

— Tabs —
Reload current Website:                       ⌘ R
Close a Tab:                                                ⌘ W
Create a Tab:                                              ⌘ T
Switch to previous / next Tab:            ⌃ ⇧ ⇥ / ⌃ ⇥       (control, shift, tab) / (control, tab)
